Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  [M] No trains between Essex St and Broadway Junction [J] Trains provide alternate service

LongDescription: <b><i>TRACK REPLACEMENT</i><br clear=left>[M] No trains between Essex St and Broadway Junction<br clear=left>[J] Trains provide alternate service</b>Weekends, 6:15 AM to 11:45 PM, Saturday, Jan 27 <i>and </i>Feb 3<br>                   8 AM to 10 PM, Sunday, Jan 28 <i>and</i> Feb 4<br><br>No [M] service at <b>Broadway Junction</b>, <b>Halsey St</b>, <b>Gates Av</b>, <b>Kosciuszko St</b>, <b>Myrtle Av</b>, <b>Flushing Av</b>,<br><b>Lorimer St</b>, <b>Hewes St</b>, <b>Marcy Av</b> and <b>Essex St</b>.<br><br>For service <i>to/from</i> these stations take the [J]* instead.<br><br><i>*Please review [J] advisories for additional information that may affect your trip.<br><br></i><b>Reminder:</b> [M] Shuttle train operates <i>all times</i> between <b>Metropolitan Av</b> and <b>Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs<br></b>and [SB] free shuttle buses operate between <b>Myrtle-Wyckoff Av</b> and <b>Myrtle Av</b>.<br><b><br>

Description._: STATION ENHANCEMENTS  [N] Astoria-bound trains skip 39 Av and Broadway

LongDescription: <b><i>STATION ENHANCEMENTS</i><br clear=left>[N] Astoria-bound trains skip 39 Av and Broadway</b>Weekends, 9:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, until Jan 29<br><br>For service<i> to</i> these stations, take the [N] to Astoria Blvd and transfer to a<br>Coney Island-bound [N].<br><br>For service<i> from </i>these stations, take the [N] to Queensboro Plaza and transfer<br>to an Astoria-bound [N].<br><br><b>Note:</b> 36 Av and 30 Av are closed for renovation.<br><b><br>

Summary._: SIGNAL MAINTENANCE  [R] Bay Ridge-bound trains run express from 71 Av to Queens Plaza

LongDescription: <b><i>SIGNAL MAINTENANCE</i><br clear=left>[R] Bay Ridge-bound trains run express from 71 Av to Queens Plaza</b><a href=http://advisory.mtanyct.info/pdf_files/ServiceGuide.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Weekend</font></a>, Saturday <i>and</i> Sunday, Jan 27 - 28<br><br></font>Trains stop at Roosevelt Av.<br><br>For service <i>to</i> 67 Av, 63 Dr, Woodhaven Blvd, Grand and Elmhurst Avs, <br>take the [R] to Roosevelt Av and transfer to a Forest Hills-bound [R].<br><br></font>For service <i>to</i> 65 St, Northern Blvd, 46, Steinway and 36 Sts, take the [R] <br>to Queens Plaza and transfer to a Forest Hills-bound [R].<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations, take the [R] to Roosevelt Av or 71 Av <br>and transfer to a Bay Ridge-bound [R].<br><b><br>
